title: Rear Brake Master Cylinder - Inspection

body.body: Visually inspect the master cylinder bore for wear, scratches or corrosion. Replace as necessary.
Check the piston for damage, wear or deterioration. Replace as necessary.
Always renew the piston seals if the cylinder has been dismantled.
Examine the push rod for bends and damage. Replace as necessary.
